Name: Cliff
Title: Icewolf Magician
Desc: A brilliant Magician with an Ice Wolf Emblem. Usually proud, but is honest with people he acknowledges.

DefaultCharge.Name: Ice Purgatory
DefaultCharge.Desc: Wields the staff to release 3 ice blades to attack enemies in the front Chance to apply Frozen.

Skill.Name: Narrative Poem of Icewolf
Skill.Desc: Increases the amount of SP auto recovery

Skill.Name: Poetic Collection of Icewolf
Skill.Desc: Slightly increases all team members' damage to Frozen enemies.

Skill.Name: Ice Prison
Skill.Desc: Seal the enemies in a large area in an Ice Cell, before shattering them with a huge impact.

Skill.Name: Ice Paradise
Skill.Desc: Wields the staff to release a freezing gale to attack enemies in the front Chance to apply Frozen.

CharInfo.EpisodeText:
A brilliant Magician with an Ice Wolf Emblem.

Although his lofty, superior attitude invites indignant glares, his strength is genuine. He is a genius, but he does not neglect practice because of it. He is very hard working, thinks highly of fellow ice Magician Jake, and is honest with people he acknowledges. However, when it comes to people who refuse to work hard, he becomes quite acrid, particularly when it comes to talented people like the slacker ice and fire Magician Leon. The latter has been a thorn in his side ever since he was a student.

There was a period of time when he served under the Magician Sloane, but soon he couldn't stand Sloane just drifting along and his undisciplined attitude, so he established himself independently. 

The "Ice Wolf Emblem" is his family's treasure that has been passed down from generation to generation. In order to inherit the mantle of his grandfather, the former headmaster of the Academy of Magic and a legendary Magician, and his father, a court Magician, he perseveres in studying spells every day.

Be it the clothes he wears or the shampoo he uses, he always chooses the best items, because he only uses things he acknowledges.
OtherText:
So you're the God's Envoy, huh?
Hmph, I'll put your skill to the test.

So you're the God's Envoy, huh?
Hmph, I'll put your skill to the test.

I'm stronger now.
Heh heh, don't you think so?

I'm better than anyone!
I shall freeze all!
Who gives you the right to order me around?
I have no use for this.
If you want something, go for it.
If you want something, go for it.
If you want something, go for it.
I have no use for this.
My Ice Blade will freeze all flames.
Hmph, don't expect any gratitude from me!
